A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Utter junk. Thanks Disney. You did it again. This movie has no thought put into the story. And why should it? Disney expects to make a new Star Wars movie every year. Lucas spent years writing his scripts. And they at least made sense regardless of if you liked the execution of them or not. Disney just seems content to play off nostalgia and rip off literally every aspect of the old movies shot for shot\, line for line. I won’t ruin it for those who haven’t seen it by giving specifics but if you want to learn more about the Star Wars universe or the story of these characters you can skip this movie. Literally nothing is revealed. Lucas is looking more and more like a genius with every Disney release.
